actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Lieutenant Colonel Matt Urban.

summary.text: Deems a named veteran to have been eligible, as of a specified date, for the special pension payable to those whose names have been entered on the Medal of Honor Roll. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a sum equal to the pension amount such veteran would have received between such date and the date on which receipt of such benefits actually began.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Lieutenant Colonel Matt Urban.
